environment.description: This value is assigned by the service provider.

get.description:
Gets fist level list of tree rule nodes (groups).

In case of `forceExpandAll` is `true` then all tree will be returned (**all nodes with nested childrens**).

200.description: OK - The request was successful, the rule tree are returned.

get.description: Get a group of rules list.

200.description: OK - The request was successful, the rule groups are returned.

201.description: Created - The request was successful and the resource is returned.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The min stock rules group id.

get.description: Get a group of rules by id.

200.description: OK - The request was successful, the rules group are returned.

put.description: Update a group of rules by id.

200.description: OK - The request was successful and the updated resource is returned.

201.description: Created - The request was successful and the resource is returned.

Gets fist level list of tree store nodes (groups).

In case of `forceExpandAll` is `true` then all tree will be returned (**all nodes with nested childrens**).

next.description: The link relation for the immediate next page of results (returns only if next page exist).

prev.description: The link relation for the immediate previous page of results (returns only if previous page exist).

last.description: The link relation for the last page of results.

first.description: The link relation for the first page of results (page numbering base `0`).

PageSizeParamSchema.description: How many items want each page to return.

PrevPageParamSchema.description: Page number is `int32` and starts at `0`.

NextPageParamSchema.description: Page number is `int32` and starts at `0`, so next page always starts from `1`.

TotalPagesSchema.description: Total pages count is `int32` (correspond to page number type).

TotalSchema.description: Type for total items in list count.

Use shelf depth capacity limit flag

Page.name: page

Page number to starts from. 
That page numbering is `0-based`.

PageSize.name: size
PageSize.description: How many items you want each page to return.

UserIdOrMePath.name: userIdOrMe
UserIdOrMePath.description: User `id` or `me` to reference on current signed in user.

Location.description: The Location response header indicates the URL to redirect a page to or created resource. It only provides a meaning when served with a 3xx (redirection) or 201 (created) status response.

BadRequest.description: Error for invalid request details description

Conflict.description: Conflict - A conflicting resource already exists.

example.message: Creating a resource with a name already exists.

Unauthorized.description: Authorization information is missing or invalid

example.message: Authorization information is missing or invalid

NotFound.description: Not Found - The requested resource could not be found.

example.message: The requested resource could not be found

bearerAuth.description:
The JWT token using Bearer scheme for authorization and authentication. The roles for authorization is specified within the token.

### [Example JWT token](https://jwt.io/#debugger-io?token=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJyb2xlIjoiUk9MRV9DQVRFR09SWV9NQU5BR0VSIiwiaXNzIjoiaHR0cHM6Ly9hbS5jNHIuZXUiLCJoYW5kbGUiOiJiaWdjYXQiLCJ1c2VySWQiOiI0MDAxNjM1NiIsImVtYWlsIjoiYmlnY2F0QGFtLmM0ci5ldSIsImp0aSI6Ijg0NjFhYzNiLWU1NGYtNDE4Zi04YTc3LTQxZGNlZDNmMjRjZCIsImlhdCI6MTUyMzM2NTY4MywiZXhwIjoxNTI4NTQ5NjgzfQ.FDHHiHkw6wGrymvBaqYW7h6nhugKUSAcLUXbClovA9c)
### Example JWT token raw data:
```
Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJyb2xlIjoiUk9MRV9DQVRFR09SWV9NQU5BR0VSIiwiaXNzIjoiaHR0cHM6Ly9hbS5jNHIuZXUiLCJoYW5kbGUiOiJiaWdjYXQiLCJ1c2VySWQiOiI0MDAxNjM1NiIsImVtYWlsIjoiYmlnY2F0QGFtLmM0ci5ldSIsImp0aSI6Ijg0NjFhYzNiLWU1NGYtNDE4Zi04YTc3LTQxZGNlZDNmMjRjZCIsImlhdCI6MTUyMzM2NTY4MywiZXhwIjoxNTI4NTQ5NjgzfQ.FDHHiHkw6wGrymvBaqYW7h6nhugKUSAcLUXbClovA9c
```
